name: Ascension (Piddau)
description:
Our submission for GMTK Game Jam 2020

Theme was Out of Control.

Our usage of the theme was that the main villain has cursed you so every now and then a curse happens that changes the way you play the game.

It can be played alone or co-op with a friend.

First player uses keyboard and mouse:

WASD to move and aim with mouse and left mouse to attack and right mouse to block.

Second player uses gamepad:

Left stick to move, right stick to aim and right trigger to attack and left trigger to block.

Not everything we planned for ended up but we are quite proud of our small game.
